lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: Working with the skin has always being my passion. Putting the smile back on a persons face makes my job worth while. When my company informed me last year that it was downsizing i was shocked but understood, it has being a tough year for a lot of small business. But I would really love the opportunity to be my own boss. I have the drive and determination to succeed, I just don't have the cash. All i want is to help someone put a smile back on the face and give them back their confidence..I have always helped out with many charities through out my career and have given many women and men back their confidence again.
lender.occupational_info: I am a licensed Medical Skin therapist. I work with the skin. Facials, Body treatments, Medical Grade Facials, laser, IPL and much more to do with the over all appearance . I am certified and trained in each area.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Hello Everyone, The reason for my being here is not for a loan but an opportunity. I am simply trying to get in front of a working major recording artist/organization for a chance to work as a full time Musician/Bassist and earn a fair living for my family. I have the skills and more than thirty five solid years of experiance touring and performing. I realize that no matter the skill level, no one is going to quit their job so I can have a job. Even if my talent is a better match for that act. It is also not my intent to try to take someone,s job. Things in any business are always subject to change and I know the opportunities are out there. I think my problems is not hearing about the right auditions in time and my location might make it difficult to be considered. I am currently not in a position to re-locate on my own but am willing to travel anywhere if it mint a chance to earn my worth. I will also audition live via Skype. I am in no way interested in start up work without a contract/retainer or financial commitment. Somehow I never hear about auditions until after all the personel is in place. Can you help? Their are samples or my work and more recent photos along with my resume at the myspace link listed in this profile. Please visit my website so you can deside if I am worth your time. Thank you in advance for any serious consideration you can offer.
lender.occupational_info: Entertainer/Musician

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: The world is a better place when we give people a chance to do something great.
lender.occupational_info: Call Center

lender.loan_because: I want to help give an opportunity to those that want to live their dreams.

lender.name: Susana
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others have the opportunity to be successful and realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a home to buy or help people sell their home to others.

lender.name: Lakeeshi
lender.loan_because: often times the business that entrepreneurs run uses up all their funds. As an entrepreneur you make money but it must be reinvested back into your business so most of the time you bring home just enough money to survive. It is very hard to save enough money to expand your business with loans. The criteria for getting loans from the bank does not take into consideration how much work you put into your job, the bank does not see the lives you impact, the banks does not care about the real reasons why you are not able to qualify for funds. The bottom line is that I will be loaning to help others like me.
lender.occupational_info: As a Child care provider I am responsible for the nurturing, teaching, and care of children who have not yet entered kindergarten. I also supervise older children before and after school. As a provider I play an important role in a child's development by caring for them when their parents are at work or are away for other reasons or when the parents place their children in care to help them socialize with children their age. In addition to attending to the child's health, safety, and nutrition, child care providers organize activities and implement curriculum that stimulates a child's physical, emotional, intellectual, and social growth. I help children explore individual interests, develop talents and independence, build self-esteem, learn how to get along with others, and prepare for more formal schooling. The things that people don't realize about most full-time providers is that they work about 60 to 70 hours a week helping children. Not only do they help children but they help parents. We train new parents on the care of their children, we train teenage parents on the care of their child. We become a resource for helping families in distress of all ages. Anyone can have a child but it takes a special person to be a parent.
